item.title: Pro-Obesity Activist Sponsored By McDonald’s Plans ‘Operation Fat Liberation’
item.description: Chaney is just one of dozens of online influencers recruited by the food industry to promote corporate-friendly narratives.

item.title: Harriet Hageman Slams Biden Administration’s Refusal To Delist Grizzly Bears As Endangered
item.description: The U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service (FWS) declined petitions from Wyoming and Montana to delist grizzly bears as endangered.

item.title: By Claiming He Would Beat Trump, Biden Basically Admits He Was Forced Out In A Coup
item.description: Joe Biden claimed he would have beat former Donald Trump in the election, essentially admitting to Kamala Harris' silent coup.

item.title: Supreme Court Chief Roberts Just Defended The Censorship-Industrial Complex
item.description: If John Roberts really wants to protect the Supreme Court's independence, he should start by disarming the administrative state.

item.title: ‘The Return’ Shirks Hollywood’s Monopoly On Masculinity
item.description: An absent father and unfaithful husband, Odysseus returns to Ithaca with one last chance, as Jordan Peterson would say, to clean his room.
